articles.author: AFP
articles.title: 'Toxic' Semen Could Turn Mosquito Mating Deadly to Curb Disease Spread - ScienceAlert
articles.description: Genetically engineered mosquitoes with toxic semen could be a new weapon against tropical disease, Australian scientists said after trialling the novel pest control method.
articles.content:
Genetically engineered mosquitoes with toxic semen could be a new weapon against tropical disease, Australian scientists said after trialling the novel pest control method.
